title: Increase logo size in header and update investigations count to 25+

requirements.text: Increase the size of the Ghostbusters-style logo displayed in the header corner of the Layout component (frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx)

quotes: make the logo a bit bigger in the corner

acceptanceCriteria: Logo in the header corner is visibly larger than current size
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and does not overflow container
Logo size increase is responsive across mobile and desktop viewports

requirements.text: Update the investigations count statistics on the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) to display '25+' instead of '50+'

quotes: on the investigations make it say 25+ instead of 50+

acceptanceCriteria: Statistics section on Home page shows '25+' for investigations count
Text change is consistent across all instances where '50+' investigations was displayed
No other numerical statistics are affected by this change

constraints: Do not modify the Ghostbusters-style logo design itself, only adjust its display size in the header
Only update the investigations count text; do not change other statistics or metrics
nonGoals: Changing the layout structure of the header
Modifying other statistics or numbers on the website
